data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_050b3045a7fd2b37f1017557f5695ca6.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
When Dyrroth's Rage reaches 50%, he will enhance <font color="a6aafb">"Burst Strike"</font> and <font color="a6aafb">"Spectre Step"</font>.

After every 2 Basic Attacks, Dyrroth will release Circle Strike, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+160% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the circle and regenerating HP according to the damage he deals (Circle Strike doesn't have Attack Effect). Each time he hits an enemy hero, the CD of <font color="a6aafb">"Burst Strike"</font> and <font color="a6aafb">"Spectre Step"</font> will be decreased by 1s.

Dyrroth releases a burst strike in a designated direction. Each burst deals 200<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies and slows them by 25% for 1.5s. (The damage decays against the same target and decreases to only 75% on minions.)

<font color="a6aafb">Abyss Enhanced</font>: Burst Strike has a longer range, deals 140% of the original damage, and its Slowing Effect is doubled.

Dyrroth dashes in the designated direction. He will stop when he has traveled the max distance or hits one enemy hero or a Creep, dealing 230<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target and slightly knocking them back. When he uses this skill again, he will lock onto a target and release a Fatal Strike (cannot apply to Minions), dealing 345<font color="fba51f"> (+120% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and reducing the target's Physical Defense by 40% for 4s.

<font color="a6aafb">Abyss Enhanced</font>: Fatal Strike will reach further and deal 150% of the original damage, slow the target by an extra 90% and reduce the target's Physical Defense by 60% for 4s.

After a short delay, Dyrroth launches a destructive strike in the target direction (cannot be interrupted), dealing 650<font color="fba51f"> (+250% Extra Physical Attack)</font> plus 20% of the target's lost HP as <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path, and slowing them by 55% for 0.8s. This skill deals up to 1500 damage to non-hero enemies.

data.name: Dyrroth

__data.skilldesc: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num2> [C1Magic Damage] to nearby enemies, [C2petrify] them for <Num1>s, and slow them by <%Num3> for <Num4>s afterward.
__data.skilldescemblem: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: High Physical Penetration to take down all but Tanks.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.
equiplist.equiptips:
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal

Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

recommendmasterplan.name: Bosston Gaming
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: Prince of the Empire who was kidnapped and used by the Abyss.

assist.desc: Dyrroth's high melee burst damage works best with heroes with single-target CC, such as Franco and Kaja.

strong.desc: Dyrroth has good chasing abilities and good melee burst damage, he is strong against heroes with poor Mobility, such as Gord and Hanabi.

weak.desc: Being a melee hero makes Dyrroth weak against heroes with Slow and kiting abilities, such as Vexana and Belerick.
